payload.content: After 30 days, an AI agent team using the same model and prompts can produce high-quality drafts with minimal edits, due to accumulated context stored in files that agents read daily.

name: After 30 days, an AI agent team using the same model and prompts can produce hig
content: After 30 days, an AI agent team using the same model and prompts can produce high-quality drafts with minimal edits, due to accumulated context stored in files that agents read daily.

payload.content: Corrective prompt-engineering involves starting with a rough sketch of an agent's personality, observing its behavior, and course-correcting over time, similar to managing human team members.

name: Corrective prompt-engineering involves starting with a rough sketch of an agent'
content: Corrective prompt-engineering involves starting with a rough sketch of an agent's personality, observing its behavior, and course-correcting over time, similar to managing human team members.

payload.content: To improve AI agent output, provide specific feedback that can be codified into rules, rather than general instructions like 'make this better.'

name: To improve AI agent output, provide specific feedback that can be codified into
content: To improve AI agent output, provide specific feedback that can be codified into rules, rather than general instructions like 'make this better.'

payload.content: Maintain an agent's memory file with specific examples of rejected patterns and good tone/style, allowing the agent to self-correct and reverse-engineer desired output.

name: Maintain an agent's memory file with specific examples of rejected patterns and
content: Maintain an agent's memory file with specific examples of rejected patterns and good tone/style, allowing the agent to self-correct and reverse-engineer desired output.

payload.content: Implement 'ruthless rules' for research agents, such as filtering information based on whether the target reader can immediately act on it, to reduce noise and increase signal.

name: Implement 'ruthless rules' for research agents, such as filtering information ba
content: Implement 'ruthless rules' for research agents, such as filtering information based on whether the target reader can immediately act on it, to reduce noise and increase signal.

payload.content: Memory in the context of AI agents refers to what the agent has learned about working with a specific user or context, while skill refers to how to correctly perform a specific task.

name: Memory in the context of AI agents refers to what the agent has learned about wo
content: Memory in the context of AI agents refers to what the agent has learned about working with a specific user or context, while skill refers to how to correctly perform a specific task.

payload.content: Skill files for AI agents compound faster than memory because they are prescriptive.

name: Skill files for AI agents compound faster than memory because they are prescript
content: Skill files for AI agents compound faster than memory because they are prescriptive.

payload.content: To ensure AI agent improvement, feedback must be stored persistently in a file (memory or skill file) rather than remaining in conversational chat, so the agent can load the lesson in subsequent sessions.

name: To ensure AI agent improvement, feedback must be stored persistently in a file (
content: To ensure AI agent improvement, feedback must be stored persistently in a file (memory or skill file) rather than remaining in conversational chat, so the agent can load the lesson in subsequent sessions.

payload.content: AI agent teams typically progress through three phases: Phase 1 (Mediocre everything, days 1-7) with generic output and high correction overhead; Phase 2 (Specific competence, days 8-21) with feedback accumulation and output improvements; and Phase 3 (Compounding returns, day 22+) with rich context and minimal changes needed.

name: AI agent teams typically progress through three phases: Phase 1 (Mediocre everyt
content: AI agent teams typically progress through three phases: Phase 1 (Mediocre everything, days 1-7) with generic output and high correction overhead; Phase 2 (Specific competence, days 8-21) with feedback accumulation and output improvements; and Phase 3 (Compounding returns, day 22+) with rich context and minimal changes needed.

payload.content: To transition an AI agent from Phase 1 to Phase 2, provide specific feedback that explains 'why' something is wrong and how it relates to the audience or goals, rather than vague corrections.

name: To transition an AI agent from Phase 1 to Phase 2, provide specific feedback tha
content: To transition an AI agent from Phase 1 to Phase 2, provide specific feedback that explains 'why' something is wrong and how it relates to the audience or goals, rather than vague corrections.
